column5: I Was givin this in 2000 after my grandfather passed away just thought I would share with you guys....The rod is a Fenwick and the reel is a Southbend I have used the rod for Perch in the spring and as for the hardware I researched a few items and this is what I got the lure in the box is a Bassmaster and the one below is a Garrett Creek Chub circa 1930 and a few spinners and spoons in the bottom is a pocket scale and stringer...
I collect alot of the vintage fishing gear. I can definatley say your stuff is in great shape, hold on to it as good vintage gear tend to go up in value real quick.  Daniel OCH

Unless you have your own place yet, save all the Items  - more of a momental than money value - When you do get your own place you will want your own man-cave, where you post your favorite Candy Pictures, put your trophies, listen to your tunes, watch your games, sneak a Beer or two, how about the antiques hanging as a display on the wall next to your Grandpas pic.
Wow that 3 hook thingy looks like a Sabiki Rig but of course GCD is almost senior material too
